datafield.subfield: Designing and Characterizing Periodic Image Monitoring Device for Remote Surveillance Purpose

The 433 MHz radio works in the Industrial, scientific and medical (ISM) frequency and gains popularity for various applications as it has low signal attenuation and insensitive transmission characteristics. This paper examines the radio for periodic monitoring image application. The assessment results shows that the radio link is able to deliver image with losses lower than 6% and period of image 40 s for 100 kbps bit rate.
